description: Write fundamental unit for real quadratic field of discriminant n as x + y*omega; sequence gives values of y for n == 2 mod 4.
comments: Entries are indexed by values of n from A039956.
references: R. A. Mollin, Quadratics, CRC Press, 1996, Tables B1-B3.
mathematica: sf = Select[2*Range[0, 139], SquareFreeQ]; NumberFieldFundamentalUnits[Sqrt[#]][[1, 2, 2]]& /@ sf (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, May 31 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 06 2000
